title: SONY Bravia W672G 125.7 cm (50 inch) Full HD LED Smart TV  (KLV-50W672G)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Warranty Card, AC Adapter, AC Power Cord, Remote Control, Table-Top Stand, User Manual, 2 Batteries
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: AVI, ASF, MP4, MKV, WebM, PS, TS
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience.. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Excellent Clarity and Detail: This TV will let you watch visuals with great clarity and minimum noise. This will allow you to see clear differences in buildings and seascapes.
product_description.X-Reality Pro: This technology offers excellent Full HD clarity by upscaling every pixel on the screen.

review: Great picture quality and sound connectivity also good 1080 full HD, screen mirroring option is there and built in Wi-Fi Sony Bravia is wonderful TV is working perfectly , installation is done buy Sony technician it's free and Wall mount is also free,I am strongly recommended to buy everyone this TV, thanks to Flipkart.

Crystal clear picture quality and the colours feel so natural. This is what Sony TV's are meant for. Sound quality is absolutely perfect with noticable bass. Obviously you won't get that extreme bass. To enjoy quality picture via STB, a HD subscription is must.
A must buy affordable quality product.
This is a nice TV comes with trust of Sony. If anybody going for 32 inch smart TV then this is best one.
thaks flipkart very very much. 🥰🥰🥰🥰 . I love it. picture quality is perfect and sound is also great. thank you again thanks a lot

Super sound and picture quality with inbuilt boofer. The brand name SONY. is sufficient for everything. Even more featured TV at low price are available in market but no comparison with Sony. Just love it.!👌👌

The name SONY says everything .. This Tv having better and best picture quality (produces natural colour) than LG , Samsung tv’s.. HDR quality is much better than LG&samsung 4k tv .. Just amazing sound quality the dynamic drive speakers gives rich sound clarity .. But little connectivity issue while screen mirroring apart from that just amazing ...

Product is good, and most importantly the delivery, setup by the sony technician before time was so good. We bought this for our aged parents as a surprise gift. Obviously they cant set up the TV by themselves and was dependent on the SONY technicians visit. As per the initial plan they were supposed to setup it up after 3 days of the delivery. But surprisingly they came the very next day and have set it up. Thank you team.
Coming to the TV by itself, so far so good. Will update more after setting up Internet and use the smart features. Presently our parents cant setup the internet, though they have a modem. They need assistance, and so we will wait for the smart TV setup and give more details here :)
